Class Blackjack

java.lang.Object
model.Game
model.Blackjack
public class Blackjack extends Game
Blackjack game, child of Game. Simulates the functionality of real Blackjack, including card shuffling, dealing, hand evaluation, and game logic.
Since:
2.0
Author:
Davitroon

  • Method Details

    • shuffleCards

      public void shuffleCards()
      Shuffles the card deck.

      Clears all player, dealer, and total card lists, fills the total deck with 52 cards, and shuffles them randomly.

      Since:
      2.0

    • dealerShouldHit

      public boolean dealerShouldHit()
      Determines whether the dealer should hit (draw another card) based on Blackjack rules.
      Returns:
      true if the dealer should hit, false otherwise
      Since:
      2.0

    • playerLoses

      public boolean playerLoses(String player)
      Checks if the specified player has exceeded 21 (busted).
      Parameters:
      player - "player" or "dealer" to indicate which hand to check
      Returns:
      true if the player's total exceeds 21, false otherwise
      Since:
      2.0

    • play

      public double play(double bet)
      Plays a round of Blackjack and calculates the resulting payout.

      - Player busts: loses the bet.
      - Dealer busts: player wins 1.75x the bet.
      - Tie with blackjack: player wins 1.5x the bet.
      - Tie without blackjack: player gets original bet (push).
      - Player wins normally: bet multiplied by 1.5 or 2.5 if blackjack.
      - Player loses normally: loses the bet.

      Specified by:
      play in class Game
      Parameters:
      bet - Amount bet by the player
      Returns:
      Resulting amount after the round

    • readCard

      private String readCard(Integer card)
      Translates a card value to its face symbol (French deck).
      Parameters:
      card - Card number (1-13)
      Returns:
      Symbolic representation ("A", "J", "Q", "K", or numeric string)
      Since:
      2.0

      public String showCards(boolean hideCard, String player)
